name: sleazily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is dirty, cheap, or not socially acceptable, especially relating to moral or sexual matters: They are sleazily ageing men who look as if they've slept in their clothes. They have behaved sleazily and should be punished.
More examplesFewer examplesHe plays a sleazily charming drunk who spends much of the film trying to attract the female heroine.She is selling her country's natural resources as quickly and sleazily as she can.He sleazily persisted in his clearly unwanted attentions.
